review_blob: one of my favorites. loads of hops but not so much that a new IPA drinker couldnt enjoy. would definetly recommend this to anybody
bottle janurary 2010. aroma of fruit and alchohol slight golden color. taste of grapefruit and malt. overall this is one of the finest bottled ipas i have ever had.

bottle aug 24. more of a yeast smell than im use to but still ok. light golden color with off white head. the taste is most compelling part. hints of yeast and fruit especially banana but not to much like a hefeweizen. overall very good.
i love bitter beer but this one just doesnt do it for me. even though it is very bitter it just doesnt work well with the overall beer.
